alt_text: Blood of the Iron Bull - Specific Location Sandgate Village - 2.jpg
summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Blood of the Iron Bull
            - Section Title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
            - Sub-Section Title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 5

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Blood of the Iron Bull


Blood of the Iron Bull materials can be used at the Shrines to upgrade your Spirits. Higher upgrades for them require more Blood of the Iron Bull materials, so it is important to find as many as you can.

If you are keen to know which Spirits you should level up, be sure to check out our guide on the best Spirits to use in the game, and for all their locations, visit our page on the Spirit Locations.

## Blood of the Iron Bull Locations

Below, you can find a guide to each Blood of the Iron Bull location within the early-game, the majority of which are in chests or found from defeating bosses.





### Blood of the Iron Bull Location 5

At the very top, on your left, there will be a chest with the Blood of the Iron Bull inside."
            - Following Text: ""

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text introduces the concept of "Blood of the Iron Bull" materials, which are used to upgrade Spirits at Shrines in the game. It emphasizes the importance of collecting these materials for higher upgrades and provides guidance on finding them, including a reference to a guide for the best Spirits and their locations. The section specifically focuses on early-game locations for these materials, often found in chests or by defeating bosses.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts a character standing in a desolate, rocky area near a small, weathered structure resembling a shrine or abandoned building. The setting includes dry grass, barren trees, and rugged terrain. The character appears equipped with a staff or weapon, suggesting exploration or preparation for combat. Based on the context, this image likely represents the location described as "Blood of the Iron Bull Location 5," where a chest containing the material can be found.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text briefly describes the specific location of the "Blood of the Iron Bull" material in this area. It instructs players to look for a chest at the very top, on the left side, which contains the material.
